Default
open /SystemWebExtensionsAUT/Sys.Application/Default.aspx
pause 500
click Button1
assertAlert The start function handled the HoverButton click event.
mouseMoveAt Button1
verifyValue hoverTrace The mouse is over the button.
click Button2
verifyValue fontSize x-large
verifyValue backgroundColor white
click Button3
assertAlert Item 0: id=Button1, type=Demo.HoverButton.<br />Item 1: id=Button2, type=Demo.HighVis.<br />
